judicialResults.label: Suspended sentence order - imprisonment

nextHearing.probationTeamName: South East and Eastern Division NPS

judicialResults.resultText:
SUSPS - Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
Committed to prison for 4 Years suspended for 2 Years. The defendant must comply with the requirements within the supervision period. This order is to be reviewed Quarterly starting on 28/09/2024 at 10:30 at Croydon Crown Court. In the event of activation of sentence: 10 bail remand days to count. Total custodial period 4 Years. Supervision period: 2 Years.
